John Halliday (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Halliday_(actor) 0 John Halliday (September 14, 1869 – October 17, 1947) was an American actor of stage and screen, who often played suave aristocrats and foreigners. John_Halliday ( September_14_,_1869 – October_17_,_1947 ) was an_American_actor of stage_and_screen , who often played suave_aristocrats_and_foreigners .
